message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the product for $1,400,000. It's a valuable asset, and I believe this price represents a fair deal for both of us. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this price is more in line with what I'm willing to pay.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $1,200,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $1,300,000. This still represents a great value for you, and it's the best I can offer at this time. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $1,300,000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,150,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, and I believe this price is more in line with what I'm willing to pay.
